name: track-single-fod-tract
label: trackSingleFODTract: Create streamlines between two ROI masks
description: This gear uses trekker (https://dmritrekker.github.io/manual/trekker.html) to create tracts between two ROI masks. See the page for the citation if you use this tool. Warning: Different config defaults were set to construct optic pathway in the gear. See the trekker page for the software defaults.

ROI_mask.description: ROI mask. This is where the tracking will end unless selected two_sided option for directionality.

seed_image.description: The first ROI image. This is where seeding starts

atMaxLength.description: This decides what the algorithm will do once maxLength is reached

directionality.description: If  set to two_sided, tracking is done along both directions starting from the seed point.

extractROILabel.description: Extract a label from the roi segmentation and use it instead of the whole label

extractSeedLabel.description: Extract a label from the seed segmentation and use it instead of the whole label.

maxLength.description: Maximum allowed length of the tracts

minLength.description: Minimum allowed length of the tracts

outputFileName.description: The name of the output file

timeLimit.description: The algorithm will look for the tracts for the specified amount of minutes

author: Ozenc Taskin
